## Input widget

```{r radio_input}
library(shiny)

#| context: server
radioButtons(
  inputId = "radio_input",
  label = "Are you a cat person or a dog person?",
  choices = c(
    "Cat person",
    "Dog person",
    "Don't make me choose!",
    "Neither :("
  ),
  selected = "Don't make me choose!"
)
```

## Widget value

```{r radio_output}
#| context: server
output$radio_output = renderPrint({
  input$radio_input
})
```

```{r radio_output_text}
verbatimTextOutput("radio_output")
```
